Title: Timothy McSweeney's.
Subtitle: At War for the Foreseeable Future and He's Never Been So Scared.
Authors: Dave Eggers.
Categories: Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=2CHuAAAAMAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Joshuah Bearman leads a daring investigation into the enigmatic Great Gerbil of central Asia, uncovering signs of an impending disaster. The issue also includes strange and wonderful stories from T.C. Boyle, Susan Straight, Jim Shepard, Wells Tower, and others..
